display_long_description:
# 🏴‍☠️ SAIL VR MULTIPLAYER 

**Rally your crew and set Sail**🏴‍☠️ 

Sail is an open world, multiplayer, VR pirate adventure game inspired by games like Sea of Thieves & Assassin's Creed Black Flag. 

# GRAPHICS UPDATE 👇

[media]

**⭐Current Features Include⭐**

- Treasure Hunting
[media]
- Pirate & Ship Combat (PvP)
- Skeleton Raids (PvE)
- Boss Battles 
- Sea Shanties
[media]
- Social Lobbies
- Player Customization
- Ship Customization
- XP & Leveling
-  LORE 
- Exploration
- Extraction Gameplay

[media]

With all these features and more on the way there's only one question left to ask. . .

# Arghhhh you ready to Set SAIL???? 

[media]

**⚠️WARNING⚠️**  
**Sail is in Early Access / Beta, and may contain bugs**
